articles.title: Man detained in connection with Brown University shooting has been released, authorities say
articles.description:
Two students were fatally shot and nine people were wounded Saturday afternoon during a final exam at the Ivy League university in Providence, Rhode Island.

The post Man detained in connection with Brown University shooting has been released, authorities say appeared first on Boston.com.
